remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601> class is used to compare the values of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects and does not compare the object references.
This class cannot be directly instantiated. Instead, the <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer.Default%2A> property must be used to return a singleton instance of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowComparer%601> class.
This class is stateless.
